doc.field: Metallgesellschaft AG METG.F> said it is founding a company to work in commodities futures and options trading and financial services linked to these. The new company, to be called MG Commodity Corp>, will be based in Zug, Switzerland, and operate from a branch in Hamburg. Metallgesellschaft will hold 80 pct of the company, and the other 20 pct will be held by Dieter Worms. REUTER
